product.shortDescription: Ecodiver combines practicality with a stylish design, made from sustainable water-resistant coated fabrics. Using Recyclex™ textiles with a water-repellent coating, Ecodiver sets a new standard within the casual travel industry. Ecodiver will guide you through the city and long-haul trips and will have your back every step of the way.

tooltip: The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions
Made with recycled fabric. All fabrics, including the lining, are created from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles.
able to resist the penetration of water to some degree but not entirely.
Recyclex® polyester fabric, which is created using 100% recycled rPET bottles, is crafted to be durable, flexible, and prevents post-consumer waste from ending up in a landfill.
To learn more about TSA locks and how to set the lock please visit our lock instructions page
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageDescription: The Ecodiver Carry-On Wheeled Duffel is a stylish and practical travel companion with water-resistant coated fabrics.
product.headlineDescription:
Ecodiver combines practically with a stylish design, made from sustainable water-resistant coasted fabrics.Using Recyclex™ textiles with a water-repellent coating, Ecodiver will guide you through the city and long-haul trips and will have your back every step of the way.

  • Overall Dimensions: 21.6 in. x 13.8 in. x 9.1 in.
  • Weight: 5.3 lbs
